decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (01, 02, P100 Rev A, P101 Rev A, P102 Rev A, P103, P104, P105, P106, P107, P108, Received: 09/08/2016. Flood Risk Assessment (dated July 2016), Design & Access Statement (dated July 2016), Unnumbered Location Plan, Received: 29/07/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
description: Erection of a side and rear roof extension to the house
